body_html:
I have worked at this code https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py
too and the transfer learning here is easy to understand, but if I decide to implement it in this way I need to create a protocol buffer file for my 'fine-tuning' graph. But I hope there is an easier way.

body:
I have worked at this code https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/examples/image_retraining/retrain.py
too and the transfer learning here is easy to understand, but if I decide to implement it in this way I need to create a protocol buffer file for my 'fine-tuning' graph. But I hope there is an easier way.
